    • notifyListener

      public void notifyListener()
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Notifies the listener that the internal state has changed.

      This method is abstract and must be implemented by each subclass to specify how updates should be propagated to the UI.

      Specified by:
      notifyListener in class GamePhaseData

    • updateState

      public void updateState()
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Updates the internal state of the phase.

      This method is optional and can be overridden by subclasses that maintain state machines or finite-step flows.

      Overrides:
      updateState in class GamePhaseData

    • handle

      public void handle(ServerAction action)
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Handles a ServerAction targeted at this phase's data.

      This method enables the application of the Visitor Pattern: the ServerAction knows how to manipulate this GamePhaseData through its loadData method.

      Specified by:
      handle in class GamePhaseData
      Parameters:
      action - the server-side action to process

    • isAdventurePhase

      public boolean isAdventurePhase()
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Indicates whether this is the adventure phase.
      Overrides:
      isAdventurePhase in class GamePhaseData
      Returns:
      false by default, overridden in specific phase subclasses
